title: Grief Support Poster

title: Misneach Centre Logo (Current)
description: Final design for The Misneach Centre, this is the latest version that I created when it was upgraded from private practice to a business of over 15 people. I kept the ogham script ('Misneach' meaning Courage in Irish) but opted for a new colour scheme and a cleaner look

title: Misneach Centre Logo (Original)
description: This was the original logo design for The Misneach Centre when it was a private practice. I created this on my phone many years ago, the only prompt I got from Anita (founder) was that she would like the ogham script and from there I created this logo. It has since been updated to a newer, sleeker version but keeps the same layout.
